experience.description: Working on the virtual dedicated server department, eventually becomes the cloud department. Mostly working on administrative webservices and system-administration. Also taking care of GitLab, create, build and maintaining several other webservices and continuous improving organisation and workflows.
Apprenticeship as computer scientists. First specialized in system integration, later switched to application development.
Apprenticeship as industrial sales representitive. Skilled how to work with people and taking care of there needs, wants and demans. Also learned accounting stuff.
